import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import {Button, Card, CardDeck} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Description.css' const Review = ({review, deleteReview, prevPage}) => { const btn = () => { console.log(review); } const deleteBtnClickHandler =(_id) => { axios.delete('http://localhost:8000/reviews/' + _id) .then(res => { deleteReview(_id); alert(`${res.data.title} has been deleted`) }) } return(
{/*

{review.title}


{review.content}
*/} {/* {review.title}

{review.preview}
*/} Card title This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This content is a little bit longer. Last updated 3 mins ago Card title This card has supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content.{' '} Last updated 3 mins ago Card title This is a wider card with supporting text below as a natural lead-in to additional content. This card has even longer content than the first to show that equal height action. Last updated 3 mins ago
) } export default Review;
